headline.main: Perez Homers to Lift Royals to 5-1 Win Over Tigers
headline.print_headline: Perez Homers to Lift Royals to 5-1 Win Over Tigers

docs.snippet: Salvador Perez homered and drove in three runs as the Kansas City Royals beat the Detroit Tigers 5-1 Tuesday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Salvador Perez homered and drove in three runs as the Kansas City Royals beat the Detroit Tigers 5-1 Tuesday night.

headline.main: Australia Says Initial MH370 Debris Drift Models Gave Wrong Clues
headline.print_headline: Australia Says Initial MH370 Debris Drift Models Gave Wrong Clues

docs.snippet: Initial models of where potential debris from a missing Malaysia Airlines passenger jet might first wash up had incorrectly identified Indonesia as the most likely location, the Australian body leading the search said on Wednesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Initial models of where potential debris from a missing Malaysia Airlines passenger jet might first wash up had incorrectly identified Indonesia as the most likely location, the Australian body leading the search said on Wednesday.

headline.main: Donaldson and Tulowitzki Homer, Jays Beat Twins 3-1
headline.print_headline: Donaldson and Tulowitzki Homer, Jays Beat Twins 3-1

docs.snippet: Josh Donaldson and Troy Tulowitzki hit solo home runs, Marco Estrada pitched 6 2-3 innings to win consecutive starts and the Toronto Blue Jays beat the Minnesota Twins 3-1 on Tuesday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Josh Donaldson and Troy Tulowitzki hit solo home runs, Marco Estrada pitched 6 2-3 innings to win consecutive starts and the Toronto Blue Jays beat the Minnesota Twins 3-1 on Tuesday night.

headline.print_headline: No. 8 Seed Svitolina Advances in Bank of the West Classic

docs.snippet: Eighth-seeded Elina Svitolina, who reached the quarterfinals of the French Open, needed three sets to beat the qualifier Kateryna Bondarenko in the first round of the Bank of the West Classic....
docs.lead_paragraph: Eighth-seeded Elina Svitolina, who reached the quarterfinals of the French Open, needed three sets to beat the qualifier Kateryna Bondarenko in the first round of the Bank of the West Classic.

headline.main: DeSclafani Handles Cardinals Again, Leads Reds to 3-2 Win
headline.print_headline: DeSclafani Handles Cardinals Again, Leads Reds to 3-2 Win

docs.snippet: Anthony DeSclafani handled the St. Louis Cardinals for the second straight start, striking out a career-high nine, and the Cincinnati Reds turned a big first inning off John Lackey into a 3-2 victory Tuesday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Anthony DeSclafani handled the St. Louis Cardinals for the second straight start, striking out a career-high nine, and the Cincinnati Reds turned a big first inning off John Lackey into a 3-2 victory Tuesday night.

headline.main: At Least 24 Killed, 300 Rescued After Trains Derail in India
headline.print_headline: At Least 24 Killed, 300 Rescued After Trains Derail in India

docs.snippet: Two passenger trains derailed over a bridge in central India while crossing a track that was flooded by heavy monsoon rains, killing at least 24 people, officials said Wednesday. More than 300 people have been rescued....
docs.lead_paragraph: Two passenger trains derailed over a bridge in central India while crossing a track that was flooded by heavy monsoon rains, killing at least 24 people, officials said Wednesday. More than 300 people have been rescued.

headline.main: Triple Homicide Investigated as Ritualistic Killing
headline.print_headline: Triple Homicide Investigated as Ritualistic Killing

docs.snippet: A triple homicide in Florida is being investigated as a possible ritualistic killing connected to the recent blue moon, a sheriff said Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A triple homicide in Florida is being investigated as a possible ritualistic killing connected to the recent blue moon, a sheriff said Tuesday.

headline.main: Photography in Cuba: It’s Not Easy

docs.snippet: An ambitious new survey of photography in Cuba aims to challenge long-held notions about how the island has been portrayed....
docs.lead_paragraph: An ambitious new survey of photography in Cuba aims to challenge long-held notions about how the island has been portrayed.

headline.main: Garlin: '51 Percent' Chance of More 'Curb Your Enthusiasm'
headline.print_headline: Garlin: '51 Percent' Chance of More 'Curb Your Enthusiasm'

docs.snippet: Jeff Garlin puts the chance of new "Curb Your Enthusiasm" episodes at "51 percent."...
